sourcesContent:
/** * Footer component * Application footer with copyright and links */ import { Component } from '@angular/core'; /** * Footer component * Contains copyright information and links */ @Component({ selector: 'app-footer', templateUrl: './footer.component.html', styleUrls: ['./footer.component.scss'] }) export class FooterComponent { /** * Current year for copyright */ currentYear = new Date().getFullYear(); }
© {{ currentYear }} Task Management Application
Privacy Policy Terms of Service Contact
